snippet: Detroit has sued a bond insurer, Syncora Guarantee Inc., blaming it for the withholding as much as $11 million a month in casino revenue, the city’s emergency manager said.
abstract: Kevyn Orr, Detroit's emergency manager, says city has sued bond insurer Syncora Guarantee Inc, blaming it for withholding as much as $11 million a month in casino revenue.
lead_paragraph: Detroit has sued a bond insurer, Syncora Guarantee Inc., blaming it for the withholding as much as $11 million a month in casino revenue, the city’s emergency manager said.

headline.main: Michigan: Detroit Sues Insurer Over Casino Money
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Detroit Sues Insurer Over Casino Money
